  • Constructor Details

    • OfficerController

      public OfficerController(IUserService userService, IProjectService projectService, IApplicationService applicationService, IOfficerRegistrationService officerRegistrationService, IEnquiryService enquiryService, User currentUser, Scanner scanner, AuthController authController)
      Constructs a new OfficerController. Calls the superclass (ApplicantController) constructor to initialize base and applicant-specific components. Instantiates and holds references to the specialized officer action, enquiry, and booking controllers.
      Parameters:
      userService - Service for user data access.
      projectService - Service for project data access.
      applicationService - Service for application data access.
      officerRegistrationService - Service for officer registration data access.
      enquiryService - Service for enquiry data access (needed by both Applicant and Officer parts).
      currentUser - The currently logged-in User (expected to be HDBOfficer).
      scanner - Scanner instance for reading user input.
      authController - Controller for authentication tasks.

  • Method Details

    • registerForProject

      public void registerForProject()
      Delegates the action to register for a project to the OfficerActionController.
      See Also:
      • OfficerActionController.registerForProject()

    • viewAndReplyToEnquiries

      public void viewAndReplyToEnquiries()
      Delegates the action to view and reply to enquiries for the handling project to the EnquiryOfficerController. Note: This is the Officer-specific version, distinct from the applicant's "viewMyEnquiries".
      See Also:
      • EnquiryOfficerController.viewAndReplyToEnquiries()

    • manageFlatBooking

      public void manageFlatBooking()
      Delegates the action to manage flat bookings to the BookingOfficerController.
      See Also:
      • BookingOfficerController.manageFlatBooking()
